abstract: EDF announced a new offer on Monday to buy a controlling stake in Edison, the second-largest energy utility in Italy.
snippet: EDF announced a new offer on Monday to buy a controlling stake in Edison, the second-largest energy utility in Italy.
lead_paragraph: The French energy giant EDF announced a new offer on Monday to buy a controlling stake in Edison, the second-largest energy utility in Italy.

headline.main: EDF of France Bids for Control of Edison of Italy
